INPUT_VERSION=v2.0.0 \
node dist/index.js

curl -vLJO -H 'Authorization: token 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gh' 'https://api.github.com/repos/inditex/lib-sisucommonsgh/releases/assets/1'

curl -H "Authorization: token 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gh" "https://api.github.com/repos/inditex/lib-sisucommonsgh/releases/tags/v2.0.0"

curl -L \
  -u jlrosende: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gh \
  -H "Accept: application/octet-stream" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer 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gh" \
  -H "X-GitHub-Api-Version: 2022-11-28" \
  -o {destination-file-name} \
  https://api.github.com/repos/inditex/lib-sisucommonsgh/releases/assets/1

curl -L \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer 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gh"\
  -H "X-GitHub-Api-Version: 2022-11-28" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/inditex/lib-sisucommonsgh/releases



gh api \
    -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" \
    -H "X-GitHub-Api-Version: 2022-11-28" \
    /repos/inditex/lib-sisucommonsgh/releases/115733377/assets --jq '.[] | select(.name=="sisu-v2.0.0-linux-amd64.tar.gz")
